title: Portfolio v1.0
description: The week 02 bootcamp challenge was to create a website from scratch with various acceptance criteria that included things like a responsive layout, images of previous projects, a profile pic of yourself, a way to contact you, etc.

title: Loot Vault
description: A website for gamers on a budget! With a responsive design and easy to use navigation, you can find any game you want at the best prices!

title: Task Titan
description: A website where you can create, track, edit, delete, and complete tasks. Use Task Titan to CRUSH your tasks to build awesome projects!

title: Portfolio v2.0
description: Version 2.0 of my portfolio was built with Vite, React, React Router, and Tailwind CSS for my UC Berkeley bootcamp.

title: WedLoc
description: WedLoc is not just another wedding platform; it's a one-of-a-kind social hub designed exclusively for wedding photographers and videographers. Our mission is to provide a seamless space for professionals to organize and showcase wedding media, making it easy for couples and guests to relive their special moments. With added features like media comments and real-time chat, we've eliminated the need for attendees to sign up, making the entire experience hassle-free.

title: Bootcamp Challenges
description: All of my bootcamp challenges consolidated into a monorepo. I decided to do this because I wanted to have a single place where I could showcase all of my work from the bootcamp not including the group projects.

title: Portfolio v2.5
description: My current portfolio built with Vite, React, React Router, and Tailwind CSS. It's a major step up from v2.0 while still using the same tech stack.

title: BrewDOCs
description: The BEST app for micro-brewers to keep track of their recipes and brews!

title: Multitask Titan
description: A collaborative task completion app for teams and organizations to increase productivity and crush their goals! Inspired by my Task Titan group project from my UC Berkeley bootcamp.

title: Hype Your Event
description: A social media app about creating and promoting events and allowing users to interact in the event space. Inspired by my wedloc group project from my UC Berkeley bootcamp.
